name: Asset Compliant Solutions
tagline: Real People, Real Passion, Real Results.
description:
President/CEO/ and Founder of ACS Inc. is Brian M. Noble. Including 18 years since Brian started ACS in 1998, he has over 25 years of experience in asset management and collateral recovery. Brian and ACS have earned the highly coveted membership and acceptance of the Commercial Law League of America.
(Of the thousands of asset management/ recovery specialist/ and collection companies in the US only 119 have qualified for membership to this select group.) ACS is also a proud member of the ACA and the ELFA both of which have very high standards for membership.
